item.text: In the seventh year, in the fifth month, on the tenth of the month, some of the elders of Israel came to seek the Lord, and they sat down in front of me.
The Lord’s message came to me:

“Son of man, speak to the elders of Israel, and tell them: ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Are you coming to seek me? As surely as I live, I will not allow you to seek me, declares the Sovereign Lord.’

Are you willing to <st data-num="08199" class="">pronounce judgment</st> on them?<n id="1" /> Are you willing to <st data-num="08199" class="">pronounce judgment</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>? Then <st data-num="03045" class="">confront</st> them with the <st data-num="08441" class="">abominable practices</st> of their <st data-num="01" class="">fathers</st>,

and say to them:

“‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: On the day I chose Israel I swore to the descendants of the house of Jacob and made myself known to them in the land of Egypt. I swore to them, “I am the Lord your God.”

On <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> I <st data-num="05375 03027">swore</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> them <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> a <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I had <st data-num="08446" class="">picked out</st><n id="2" /> for them, a land <st data-num="02100" class="">flowing</st> with <st data-num="02461" class="">milk</st> and <st data-num="01706" class="">honey</st>,<n id="3" /> the most <st data-num="06643" class="">beautiful</st> of <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">lands</st>.
I said to them, “Each of you must get rid of the detestable idols you keep before you, and do not defile yourselves with the idols of Egypt; I am the Lord your God.”

But they <st data-num="04784" class="">rebelled</st> against me and <st data-num="03808 014">refused</st> to <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> me; <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">one</st> <st data-num="07993" class="">got rid of</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">their</st> <st data-num="08251" class="">detestable idols</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03808" class="">nor</st> did they <st data-num="05800" class="">abandon</st> the <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st>. I acted for the sake of my reputation, so that I would not be profaned before the nations among whom they lived, before whom I revealed myself by bringing them out of the land of Egypt.
“‘So I brought them out of the land of Egypt and led them to the wilderness.

I <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> them my <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03045" class="">revealed</st> my <st data-num="04941" class="">regulations</st> to them. The <st data-num="0120" class="">one</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">carries</st><n id="3" /> them out will <st data-num="02425" class="">live</st> by them!<n id="4" />
I also gave them my Sabbaths as a reminder of our relationship, so that they would know that I, the Lord, sanctify them.

But the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="04784" class="">rebelled</st> against me in the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st>; they did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">follow</st> my <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st> and they <st data-num="03988" class="">rejected</st> my <st data-num="04941" class="">regulations</st> (the <st data-num="0120" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">obeys</st> them will <st data-num="02425" class="">live</st> by them), and they <st data-num="03966" class="">utterly</st> <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrated</st> my <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbaths</st>. I <st data-num="06213" class="">acted</st> <st data-num="04616" class="">for the sake of</st> my <st data-num="08034" class="">reputation</st>, <st data-num="01115" class="">so that</st> I would <st data-num="01115" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="02490" class="">profaned</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> in <st data-num="0834" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">sight</st> I had <st data-num="03318" class="">brought</st> them <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st>.

I did this<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03282" class="">because</st> they <st data-num="03988" class="">rejected</st> my <st data-num="04941" class="">regulations</st>, did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">follow</st> my <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st>, and <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrated</st> my <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbaths;</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> their <st data-num="03820" class="">hearts</st> <st data-num="0310 01980">followed</st> their <st data-num="01544" class="">idols</st>.<n id="2" />
Yet I had pity on them and did not destroy them, so I did not make an end of them in the wilderness.
“‘But I said to their children in the wilderness, “Do not follow the practices of your fathers; do not observe their regulations, nor defile yourselves with their idols.
I am the Lord your God; follow my statutes, observe my regulations, and carry them out.
Treat my Sabbaths as holy and they will be a reminder of our relationship, and then you will know that I am the Lord your God.”

But the <st data-num="01121" class="">children</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="04784" class="">rebelled</st> against me, did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">follow</st> my <st data-num="02708" class="">statutes</st>, did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08104" class="">observe</st> my <st data-num="04941" class="">regulations</st> by <st data-num="06213" class="">carrying</st> them <st data-num="06213" class="">out</st> (the <st data-num="0120" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="06213" class="">obeys</st><n id="2" /> them will <st data-num="02425" class="">live</st> by them), and <st data-num="02490" class="">desecrated</st> my <st data-num="07676" class="">Sabbaths</st>. But I <st data-num="07725" class="">refrained from</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">doing so</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="06213" class="">acted</st> instead <st data-num="04616" class="">for the sake of</st> my <st data-num="08034" class="">reputation</st>, <st data-num="01115" class="">so that</st> I would <st data-num="01115" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="02490" class="">profaned</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">before</st> the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> in <st data-num="0834" class="">whose</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">sight</st> I had <st data-num="03318" class="">brought</st> them <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st>.

I declared them to be defiled because of their sacrifices—they caused all their firstborn to pass through the fire—so that I might devastate them, so that they would know that I am the Lord.’
“Therefore, speak to the house of Israel, son of man, and tell them, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: In this way too your fathers blasphemed me when they were unfaithful to me.

I <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> them <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0834">that</st> I <st data-num="05375 03027">swore</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> them, but whenever they <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="07311" class="">high</st> <st data-num="01389" class="">hill</st> or <st data-num="05687" class="">leafy</st> <st data-num="06086" class="">tree</st>, they <st data-num="02076" class="">offered</st> their <st data-num="02077" class="">sacrifices</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> and <st data-num="05414 08033">presented</st> the <st data-num="07133" class="">offerings</st> that <st data-num="03708" class="">provoked</st> me <st data-num="03708" class="">to anger</st>. They <st data-num="07760" class="">offered</st> their <st data-num="05207" class="">soothing</st> <st data-num="07381" class="">aroma</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> and <st data-num="05258 08033">poured out</st> their <st data-num="05262" class="">drink offerings</st>.
So I said to them, “What is this high place you go to?”’ (So it is called “High Place” to this day.)
“Therefore say to the house of Israel, ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Will you defile yourselves like your fathers and engage in prostitution with detestable idols?

When you present your sacrifices—when you make your sons pass through the fire—you defile yourselves with all your idols to this very day. Will I allow you to seek me, O house of Israel? As surely as I live, declares the Sovereign Lord, I will not allow you to seek me!
“‘What you plan will never happen. You say, “We will be like the nations, like the clans of the lands, who serve gods of wood and stone.”
As surely as I live, declares the Sovereign Lord, with a powerful hand and an outstretched arm and with an outpouring of rage, I will be king over you.

I will <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> you <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">nations</st> and will <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> you <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">lands</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> you are <st data-num="06327" class="">scattered</st>, with a <st data-num="02389" class="">powerful</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> and an <st data-num="05186" class="">outstretched</st> <st data-num="02220" class="">arm</st> and with an <st data-num="08210" class="">outpouring</st> of <st data-num="02534" class="">rage</st>!

I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> you <st data-num="0413" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="04057" class="">wilderness</st> of the <st data-num="05971" class="">nations</st>, and <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> I will <st data-num="08199" class="">enter into judgment</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st>-<st data-num="0413" class="">to</st>-<st data-num="06440" class="">face</st>.
Just as I entered into judgment with your fathers in the wilderness of the land of Egypt, so I will enter into judgment with you, declares the Sovereign Lord.

I will make you <st data-num="05674" class="">pass</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="07626" class="">shepherd’s staff</st>,<n id="2" /> and I will <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> you into the <st data-num="04562" class="">bond</st> of the <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st>.

I will eliminate from among you the rebels and those who revolt against me. I will bring them out from the land where they have been residing, but they will not come to the land of Israel. Then you will know that I am the Lord.

“‘As for you, O house of Israel, this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Each of you go and serve your idols, if you will not listen to me. But my holy name will not be profaned again by your sacrifices and your idols.

For there on my holy mountain, the high mountain of Israel, declares the Sovereign Lord, all the house of Israel will serve me, all of them in the land. I will accept them there, and there I will seek your contributions and your choice gifts, with all your holy things.

When I <st data-num="03318" class="">bring</st> you <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">nations</st> and <st data-num="06908" class="">gather</st> you <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">lands</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">where</st> you are <st data-num="06327" class="">scattered</st>, I will <st data-num="07521" class="">accept</st> you along with your <st data-num="05207" class="">soothing</st> <st data-num="07381" class="">aroma</st>. I will <st data-num="06942" class="">display</st> my <st data-num="06942" class="">holiness</st> among you in the <st data-num="05869" class="">sight</st> of the <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>.
Then you will know that I am the Lord when I bring you to the land of Israel, to the land I swore to give to your fathers.

And <st data-num="08033" class="">there</st> you will <st data-num="02142" class="">remember</st> your <st data-num="01870" class="">conduct</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="05949" class="">deeds</st> by <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> you <st data-num="02930" class="">defiled</st> yourselves. Then you will know that I am the Lord, when I deal with you for the sake of my reputation and not according to your wicked conduct and corrupt deeds, O house of Israel, declares the Sovereign Lord.’”
(21:1) The Lord’s message came to me:

“<st data-num="01121" class="">Son</st> of <st data-num="0120" class="">man</st>, <st data-num="07760 06440">turn</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">toward</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="08486" class="">south</st>,<n id="2" /> and <st data-num="05197" class="">speak out</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="01864" class="">south</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="05012" class="">Prophesy</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="03293" class="">open scrub</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="07704" class="">land</st> of the <st data-num="05045" class="">Negev</st>,

and say to the scrub land of the Negev, ‘Listen to the Lord’s message! This is what the Sovereign Lord has said: Look here, I am about to start a fire in you, and it will devour every green tree and every dry tree in you. The flaming fire will not be extinguished, and the whole surface of the ground from the Negev to the north will be scorched by it.
And everyone will see that I, the Lord, have burned it; it will not be extinguished.’”
Then I said, “O Sovereign Lord! They are saying of me, ‘Does he not simply speak in eloquent figures of speech?’”
